section.p: You are approached by a patrol of the Soulwatch, the black-garbed religious police. They are remorseless in their pursuit of fugitives and heretics. And you are most wanted, for renouncing the worship of Ebron, a foul crime in the eyes of the fanatic Uttakin.
One of the Soulwatch recognises you instantly. 'Get the unbelieving heretic!' he cries.

You decide to make yourself scarce. Roll one die and add 1.
